mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post_file_tag(tag_left, tag_top, member_id, post_section_file_id) VALUES (#{tagLeft}, #{tagTop}, #{memberId}, #{postSectionFileId})
mapper.select: select tpft.id, tag_left, tag_top, tpft.member_id, post_section_file_id, member_name, vfmf.file_path,tm.social_img_url from tbl_post_file_tag tpft join tbl_member tm on tpft.member_id = tm.id left join view_file_member_file vfmf on tm.id = vfmf.member_id where post_section_file_id = #{fileId}
